data.name: TACTICAL BANDITS
data.detailed_description:
Join us on DISCORD to follow the development of TACTICAL BANDITS!!

Travel on a post-apocalyptic journey to the West Coast in this extremely challenging top-down action game. Rescue strangers, scavenge supplies, and wade through piles of human and non-human enemies.

Decide where to go next to reach the Last Settlement, the last known human encampment located on the West Coast. Just remember when traveling, every location is different, and every action could have a consequence. Choose wisely what you need or who to save on this perilous journey.

KEY FEATURES
  • SINGLEPLAYER - Travel to the West Coast through abandoned homes, deserted shops, and derelict highways, to reach the Last Settlement
  • MULTIPLAYER - Work together to take down high stake locations in local co-op, or fight against each other to become the last survivor standing in numerous different local multiplayer modes
  • ENVIRONMENTAL DESTRUCTION - Choose your own way to get past a location - quietly by hiding in the corners, loudly as a one-man army, or by bringing down buildings on your enemies
  • UNLOCKABLES - Unlock new weapons, items, game modes, and hats (just because the world has declined, does not mean your looks have to as well)

data.short_description: TACTICAL BANDITS is an extremely challenging top-down action game where the player travels on a journey to the West Coast to reach the Last Settlement, the last known human survivor camp.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista
  • Processor: 1.6GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
